column4: Hello, folks. I'm looking for a long-suffering soul who looks kindly on newbies, for a DCC

OK, thanks. I just downloaded the "live" iso. At boot (CD boot enabled), the machine putters for a LONG time, then starts Windows, and tells me that is has trapped a "serious error". What's am I doing wrong?
Download again? Burn again? Does a CDRW work?
